Articles.Content:
Hi,

Whatever my name, whatever the country I come from, today, I felt the need to say, THANK YOU.

Thank you for this 3 years of dreaming, hopes, knowledges and fun.

I know that video is pretty bad, but I give it all my heart for make that.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1O6eDlCdLag?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Thank you, thank you very much Squad.

Nicolas.

This ist not bad at all!

In fact, you succeeded in creating a wonderful composition of music and pictures - great job!
